body:
So I was playing nebula when someone told me to join Neb 04 as he saw a hacker (he told me to record Marix1000 hacking) heres the link :
http://youtu.be/LOe6-dWOOgE
body_tagged:

title: Marix1000

replies.body:
I didn't saw him hacking, maybe you can told me what he did.
And pls post it at player reports :)
replies.body_tagged:
I didn't saw him hacking, maybe you can told me what he did.
And pls post it at player reports :)

replies.body: It sure looked like he was hacking :/
replies.body_tagged: It sure looked like he was hacking :/

replies.body: He was flying about and it was nearly impossible to hit him.
replies.body_tagged: He was flying about and it was nearly impossible to hit him.

replies.body:
well then I don't get it xD
If you mean the Teleport thing, he was in the respawnscreen and didn't push the respawn button, so he wasn't at the spawn and he stayed at his death point.
Or if you mean the speed and fly thing, yes he was hacking !
replies.body_tagged:
well then I don't get it xD
If you mean the Teleport thing, he was in the respawnscreen and didn't push the respawn button, so he wasn't at the spawn and he stayed at his death point.
Or if you mean the speed and fly thing, yes he was hacking !

replies.body: Yeah I meant the speed thing. When I teleported to him I was just like WUT THE HECK!?
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I meant the speed thing. When I teleported to him I was just like WUT THE HECK!?

replies.body: But the speed  and flying are hacks. No doubt about that.
replies.body_tagged: But the speed  and flying are hacks. No doubt about that.

replies.body: yep sometimes this can happened and post the vid in the player reports
replies.body_tagged: yep sometimes this can happened and post the vid in the player reports

replies.body: The entire chat was like "Marix1000 hax!!" until I recorded him :P
replies.body_tagged: The entire chat was like "Marix1000 hax!!" until I recorded him :P

replies.body: I wanted to get other peoples opinions before putting it in Player reports.
replies.body_tagged: I wanted to get other peoples opinions before putting it in Player reports.

replies.body:
well he is now banned so...
It's all okay at Avicus ;D
